name: MortalGiraffe
description:
Eat the most leaves or attack the neck of your friend to win the fight !

Mortal Giraffe is a short local 1v1 fighting game compatible with a controler and with a keyboard.

CONTROLS PLAYER 1
[E]  Move Up
[D] Move Down
[T] Attack
[Y] DefendPLAYER 2
[Up Arrow]  Move Up
[Down Arrow] Move Down
[O] Attack
[P] Defend
CREDITS

Music is "Sand in Shoes" by Anipatok
